welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Arlington, where the charm of small town living meets the excitement of city life. Known for its beautiful parks and diverse culture, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to executive and luxury travelers, providing exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal, exclusively serving United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and shipping operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Air France, Japan Airlines, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves Delta Air Lines and Delta Connection.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, and Singapore Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves JetBlue and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves British Airways, Qatar Airways, and other international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves American Airlines and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
